One can only dream.
Trump will be ousted, Hillary will be sworn in, and everything will be right in the world again. The end.
Those votes will be made invalid, shifting the electoral college in Hillary's favour, meaning she is the legitimate POTUS.
Namely, that there was voter fraud, but those voters voted for Trump, allowing him to win the electoral college.
You know what I would like to see happen? That this investigation reveals many things... https://t.co/tho4cLrNT2
NZ: the favored refuge for elite in event of disaster. Buying property here a type of apocalypse insurance. https://t.co/gkOvKfvMV0
@thatjohn I was laughing pretty hard at her. She's such a derp and wouldn't let us help.
@Lukeurmyson That was probably their whole plan with the alternative facts and fake news. More like Trump's distorted reality.
Is it just me or is Trump looking less orange in the last couple days? Has he missed his daily spray tan? (Currently watching CNN.)
And here is the video footage: https://t.co/lbH58mEMU4
Absolutely hilarious to watch. Not sure how she got into it, cat powers I guess. But hilarity has turned to worry. Derp cat of the day.
We found the plastic bag under the house (at least we think it's the same one) but now Nimbus has gone to hide.
And back down the hallway, out the cat door and under the house. All with his plastic bag on her.
She managed to get one of the large plastic bags around her neck (I had left the room for a minute). She comes into the office then lounge.
I grab the T-shirt I bought @jethrocarr and walk down to the office to show him. Next second Nimbus comes screaming down the hallway.
Hilarious story of out cat Nimbus: So I just got home from Kmart and have a couple of those big plastic bags that unpacking in the kitchen.
@kassh Yes, unfortunately our security cams missed it.
@kassh 🙌 This is only the second time it has happened in two+ years we've been here. The other one was a couple weeks ago.
